mapper.insert: insert into user_t(loginName, loginPassword, userCode, userPhone) values (#{loginName},#{loginPassword},#{userCode},#{userPhone})
insert into tour_t (tourName, tourCode, posLat, poslng,timeAdd) values (#{tourName},#{tourCode},#{posLat},#{poslng},#{timeAdd})
mapper.select: select * from tour_t where tourName like concat ('%',#{name},'%') order by timeAdd
select count(*) from dreamlist_t where tourCode=#{tourCode} and userCode=#{userCode}
SELECT tour_t.tourName,tour_t.tourCode,dt.userCode FROM dreamlist_t AS dt INNER JOIN tour_t ON tour_t.tourCode = dt.tourCode WHERE dt.userCode = #{userCode} GROUP BY dt.timeAdd
SELECT tourCode, commentText, commentCode, loginName FROM comment_t INNER JOIN user_t ON user_t.userCode = comment_t.userCode WHERE tourCode = #{tourCode}
SELECT tour_t.tourCode as tourCode, count(dreamListCode) as numCount, tourName FROM dreamlist_t INNER JOIN tour_t on tour_t.tourCode = dreamlist_t.tourCode GROUP BY dreamListCode LIMIT 5
